TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ibuh, title = Ibuh, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ibuh} }

S.FORM: Ibuh Itiniay i Xiulin Cen no Hualien ko Ibuh a niyaro', 164 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 583 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 554 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 29 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Truku 83%, Amis 2%, Tayal 3%, Paiwan 1%, Bunun 1%, roma 3%.

Iboh Itiniay i Xiolin Cen no Hoalien ko Iboh a niyaro', 164 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 583 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 554 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 29 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Troko 83%, Amis 2%, Tayal 3%, Paiwan 1%, Bonon 1%, roma 3%.
